messages.title: More Jobs
messages.content: Lower taxes, lower bills and better-paid jobs.

messages.title: SCHOOLS
messages.content: Under the Conservatives there are more good and outstanding schools than ever before.

messages.title: NHS
messages.content: It's vital that every family has the care they need.

messages.title: DON'T RISK IT
messages.content: Britain would face the chaos of a hung Parliament. Jeremy Corbyn imposed as Prime Minister - propped up by the minor parties.

messages.title: TAKING BACK CONTROL OF OUR LAWS AND OUR BORDERS
messages.content: Theresa May and the Conservatives will take control of our laws again. And they will take control of our borders again.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Theresa May will get every detail of the Brexit deal right. She has a plan to get the best deal for Britain in the negotiations.
Cut income tax for working people, increase the personal allowance to £12,500, and no increase in the rate of VAT.
4 billion extra over the next five years for schools.
Spend at least £8 billion more on the NHS over the next five years.
Control and reduce immigration, while still attracting the brightest and the best to Britain.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A loss of just 6 seats and Theresa May’s Government loses its majority - putting Brexit negotiations at risk.

issues.brexitEurope: Theresa May needs your local vote to strengthen her hand in the Brexit negotiations with the EU and get the right Brexit deal for the country.
issues.economy: Many families struggle to cope with monthly bills. The Conservatives will cap rip-off energy tariffs.
issues.governance: Don't risk the chaos of a hung Parliament.
issues.health: Everything depends on getting a good Brexit deal for the NHS.
issues.immigration: Taking back control of our laws and our borders.

leaflet.personalStatement: Theresa May has a plan to make a success of Brexit and deliver on the will of the British people. She's the only one able to get the best deal in the tough negotiations ahead.

images.caption: Theresa May speaking to an audience
